◆ 1.32.5 Update Details

◆ 1.32.5 Update Details
- Portuguese is added. Language change is possible in the settings of the game.
- Minor bug fixed.

1. The UI has been improved.
- The UI of the timeline has been reorganized to visually convey the progress of the game.
- Various UI has been improved.
2. A language has been added.
- German, French, Spanish, Russian, Thai and Indonesian have been added.
3. Several bugs and typos have been fixed.

3. Several bugs and typos have been fixed.
